meanings.sent1: The smoke upcurls from the chimney.
meanings.sent2: She upcurls her hair before going out.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail upcurls when it's happy.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's ribbon upcurls gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent5: The steam upcurls from the hot cup of tea.

meanings.sent1: Her hair has beautiful upcurls at the ends.
meanings.sent2: The upcurls of the waves added texture to her hairstyle.
meanings.sent3: The pastry chef created delicate upcurls of chocolate on the cake.
meanings.sent4: The upcurls of the vine reached towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The upcurls of the staircase gave it an elegant touch.
